name: Help
description:
Your daughter was gone at a research of the abandoned bunker. Having gone to find her, you meet the horrors living in these walls, solve puzzles, discover what has happened in this place and to find the daughter. Everything that you have, is a lamp which charge constantly decreases also the radio.Features
  • Support a lamp charge by means of batteries
  • Use the radio for the solution of puzzles and to discover location of enemies
  • Read notes to learn about what has happened
